text: ...is anyone watching the Tour de France? I’ve been tuning in to a bootleg euro feed but would love to figure out if there’s a place to watch some of the bigger stages here in town. With the time difference it’s kinda well-timed for morning commute and an espresso...
aha, St. Honore’s locations are all showing it: <https://www.facebook.com/StHonoreBakeryNWThurman/posts/10153467411141627:0>

attachments.text: Join us in celebrating the Tour de France! From July 2nd through July 24th, come into St. Honoré where there will be a live broadcast from the event in...
